timeline.bodyText:
have you tried using same command for both something like
"helm install "+ name + " ingress-per-domain" or
"helm install --name "+ name + " ingress-per-domain"
timeline.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText: Helm V3.x  does not accept --name argument, instead it take a chart name as first argument directly.  So there is no common syntax for both Helm Release
replies.author: anpanigr
